issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Break up logical_plan/mod.rs into smaller modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10559](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10559). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The module has gotten fairly large and so refactoring it into smaller chunks will improve readability  – as suggested by Jorge https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8619#pullrequestreview-527391221

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10559?focusedCommentId=17230357) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8639
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8639>
